verses.text: \w On|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* report, \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* clothes, \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* Eliakim \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* administrator, \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* leading \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w all|strong="H5921"\w* wearing \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amoz

\w to|strong="H5704"\w* tell \w him|strong="H3205"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*, \w rebuke|strong="H8433"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* disgrace; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w point|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* no \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w deliver|strong="H6869"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w Perhaps|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w*, whom \w his|strong="H3605"\w* master \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w defy|strong="H2778"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* still survives.”

\w So|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*,

\w who|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w Tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* master \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H1442"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rumor|strong="H8052"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* own land, where \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.’” Sennacherib’s Blasphemous Letter (Isaiah 37:8–13)

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w left|strong="H4672"\w* \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w withdrew|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w fighting|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H2009"\w* Sennacherib \w had|strong="H4428"\w* been warned \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w Tirhakah|strong="H8640"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*:\f + \fr 19:9 \ft That is, the upper Nile region\f* “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*.” \w So|strong="H7971"\w* Sennacherib \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, saying,

“\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w message|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: ‘\w Do|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* whom \w you|strong="H5414"\w* trust, \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* saying \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria.

\w Surely|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* countries, devoting \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w*.\f + \fr 19:11 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering.\f* \w Will|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w spared|strong="H5337"\w*?

Did \w the|strong="H7843"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7843"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* \w by|strong="H5337"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* fathers \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*—\w the|strong="H7843"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gozan|strong="H1470"\w*, \w Haran|strong="H2771"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rezeph|strong="H7530"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7843"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5729"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Telassar|strong="H8515"\w*?

Where \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, Arpad, \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*, \w Hena|strong="H2012"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ivvah|strong="H5755"\w*?’” Hezekiah’s Prayer (Isaiah 37:14–20)

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H6566"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w enthroned|strong="H3427"\w* \w between|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w*, \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w alone|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w Incline|strong="H5186"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. \w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w defy|strong="H2778"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Truly, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H2717"\w* \w waste|strong="H2717"\w* \w these|strong="H4428"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w lands|strong="H2717"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* gods \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fire \w and|strong="H3027"\w* destroyed \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* gods, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* stone—\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w human|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w so|strong="H6258"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w alone|strong="H3045"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.” Sennacherib’s Fall Prophesied (Isaiah 37:21–35)

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amoz \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*: “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H6419"\w* \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assyria.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: ‘\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w Daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* despises \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w mocks|strong="H3932"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w shakes|strong="H5128"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w behind|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w taunted|strong="H2778"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H1442"\w*? \w Against|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w raised|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* pride? \w Against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*!

\w Through|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3772"\w* servants \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w taunted|strong="H2778"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* said: “\w With|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5927"\w* many \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w heights|strong="H4791"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w remote|strong="H3411"\w* peaks \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*. \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* tallest cedars, \w the|strong="H5927"\w* finest \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* \w cypresses|strong="H1265"\w*.\f + \fr 19:23 \ft Or pines or junipers or firs\f* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w reached|strong="H5927"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* \w farthest|strong="H7093"\w* outposts, \w the|strong="H5927"\w* densest \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* \w forests|strong="H3293"\w*.
